resources.string: stuff to put other stuff in

box (cardboard box, corrugated fiberboard box, folding carton box, wooden box), plastic container (plastic container, clamshell, foam food container, lunch box/Tuppelware, food carrier), bulk container (basket, waste basket, bin, crate, case, trunk, chest)
